phrases: After we visit Big Bro's grave, let us get something to eat, Josuke.
Italian Cuisine Trendy 100 Meters to the Left
There is a new Italian restaurant.
No one would come to eat at a restaurant in a place like this.
Josuke, I think that might actually be what brings people in.
The flavor must be like, Oh, man!
I thought this was an empty building...
Today's Course Depends on the Customer With Coffee Dessert From 3,500 yen
Episode 10 Let us Go Eat Some Italian Food
We get to eat authentic Italian food!
I have studied various cuisines to better the cuisine of my motherland.
Then I came to Japan hoping to get my chance.
There are plenty of farms where you can get fresh produce,
and the seafood is wonderful, as well.
Using the ingredients that Morioh has to offer,
I will bring you food that will make you feel your best.
I wonder what I should get.
Could we hurry up and get the menu?
We do not have a menu here.
What do you mean you do not have a menu?
Because what I serve depends on the customer.
It means that I will determine the dishes by looking at the customers.
You mean you are not going to let the customer eat what they want?
You had diarrhea last night, did not you?
And you did not sleep enough.
You only slept about four hours, did not you?
No wonder your eyes are so puffy.
Let me see your left hand, too.
You have athlete's foot on your right foot.
You have two cavities and your left shoulder is stiff, right?
H-How do you know all that?!
By looking at both of your hands, I know everything about your health.
Yeah, I am not really hungry, so just coffee is fine.
Healthy food that concentrates too much on being healthy
If it tastes even a little bad, we do not have to pay.
I-I have never had water this delicious before!
It is like... water filled with elegance...
It is like the water a princess in the Alps playing a harp would drink, perhaps.
Like the first water you drink after wandering in the desert for three days.
What brand of water is this?
Th-This water is so delicious that I am about to cry.
Hey, you do not have to cry just from drinking some water.
Maybe it is because it is so pure.
Hey, there is something wrong with you.
Wh-What the hell's with these tears?!
Okuyasu, y-your eyes, your eyeballs, the white part...
It is all shriveled up and squishy!
What did you make Okuyasu drink?
His eyeballs will only be shriveled up momentarily.
That mineral water is from snow on Kilimanjaro in Africa
It is water that flushes out the inside of the eyeball,
along with any dirt, and helps relieve insomnia.
The reason you did not start crying when you drank it
is because you got plenty of sleep last night.
I am not sleepy at all now!
Like I slept a full ten hours!
O-Okuyasu, are you sure there is nothing wrong with your eyes?
Josuke, when you drink water this good for the first time,
trust me, you are bound to cry.
I cried even more when I watched the movie Champ on video.
Now, shall we continue with the meal?

Ingredients Mozzarella cheese (4 thin slices) Tomatoes (5 thin slices) Tonio's Special Dressing 1 Anchovy Seaweed Olive oil White wine vinegar Lemon juice Salt Pepper Etc. Balsamic vinegar (just a splash) Toast Lettuce (for garnish) (Best eaten within 15 minutes of preparation)
For the antipasto, we have a salad with mozzarella cheese and tomatoes.
Mozzarella cheese is a soft, fresh cheese whose fat has been taken out.
Everyone in Italy loves to eat it.
The first people to use tomatoes in cooking were the Italians.
Nothing can compare to the way an Italian prepares tomatoes.
I am not sure what it is, but this cheese does not have much flavor.
You need to put it in your mouth with the tomato.
Well, most foreign dishes do not suit Japanese tastes.
The juicy part of the tomatoes wraps around the mild cheese!
The cheese brings out the tomato, and the tomato brings out the cheese!
It is like harmony, or like a harmony of tastes!
It is kind of like a Simon and Garfunkel duet!
Asao Takamori's original Ashita no Joe
with the Ashita no Joe that Tetsuya Chiba directed!
I could not be happier that you enjoyed it.
You should just order some yourself!
There is no way you are getting mine.
I would not give you any even if you were about to die of hunger.
I am so glad I was born, Mom!
I knew you were cheap, but I did not know it was this bad!
I will order a plate myself.
However, the only one who will have his stiff shoulder cured is the
customer right there, who has the stiff shoulder.
C-Come to think of it, my neck feels a bit hot.
Sir, I recommend that you take off your jacket.
S-Something slimy is stuck to my fingers!
It is proof that your metabolism has improved and blood is circulating well.
The calcium, vitamins, and minerals in the antipasto that you just ate
have stimulated the thyroid gland in your throat that controls your metabolism.
All of your bad cells are coming out as dead skin.
Keep scratching, and get all of the dead skin off!
It is as big as a softball now!
You are starting to dig at the muscle in your shoulder!
My shoulder feels so stupidly light!
I feel like there is a balloon on my shoulder now, it is so light!
My shoulder's so much more flexible!
I have never been able to do this before!
My shoulder is not stiff anymore!
Now, if you will excuse me for a bit.
I have to make sure the pasta boils properly.
That Chef Tonio guy is a genius!
There is definitely something strange about his cooking!
How to get there: 1 minute on foot after getting off the bus headed towardMorioh's Kunimi Mountain Pass Cemetery
An unusual restaurant with no set menu.
The chef will decide the menu based on how the customer is feeling that day.
Because seating is limited, it is recommended that you make a reservation.
Now, let us continue with the meal, shall we?
This will be your pasta course.
Ingredients Spaghetti Pitted black olives Olive oil Anchovies Garlic Red peppers Cherry tomatoes Misc: Parsley, salt, pepper, etc Parmesan cheese (Best eaten while still hot)
Apparently the name of this dish came from
hard-working ladies of the night making something random
Usually, you do not put cheese on pasta with garlic,
but this pasta is an exception.
Are there red peppers in this spaghetti?
The harlot's spaghetti uses a pasta sauce that is one of the oldest in Italian cuisine.
It was born in my hometown of Naples.
That is why I recommend this dish.
I cannot even eat curry rice unless it is
Vermont Curry's mild flavor with the apples and honey.
I cannot eat sushi with wasabi in it, either.
If you cannot eat spicy food, Okuyasu,
If you cannot eat it, do not worry.
I am perfectly fine with not charging for that pasta.
I will go make the secondo piatto, the main dish.
However, my spaghetti is made such that even people who
do not like spicy things can eat it.
Even if I do not like spicy things?
I totally admit that you are a talented chef, Tonio!
No, maybe you were lucky that you could not eat it.
Do not you think this food and that water are way too weird?
You lost a softball's worth of dead skin, and you cried your eyes out!
When I went to Shirabu Hot Springs in Yamagata,
I lost even more dead skin, and my back pain went away!
I just remembered what that Toshikazu Hazamada said.
Stand users, for some reason, seem to be unknowingly...
Stand users are drawn to each other!
Are you saying that Tonio is a Stand user, too?
That is why I am saying he is suspicious!
If you cannot eat spicy food, stop licking it!
I cannot eat spicy food, but you know...
I just want to keep licking this spaghetti sauce.
I should not be able to eat something this spicy...
Once I tasted it, I was sucked in by the spiciness.
It is like when you eat your age in beans at the Setsubun Festival,
and you do not even really like them, but before you know it,
you have eaten a whole bag!
Hey, I told you to stop eating that!
The more I eat, the more I want to eat!
C-Come to think of it, I had a cavity on my lower jaw, too...
A molar is growing in at that speed?!
I do not know what he is plotting, but...
But I wanted to eat more...
I am going to revert that spaghetti back to its original ingredients!
What were those little things just now?
Tonio Trendy was a Stand user after all!
My shoulder stiffness disappeared, and new teeth replaced my cavities, but...
So the main course is finished...
You are eating that right up.
Looks like the main dish, lamb in apple sauce, is a success.
So you came in here to spy on me?!
Why do I have to listen to you threatening to make me pay?
What the hell are you trying to do with your cooking?!
My stomach hurts, but I cannot help eating it!
Every time the tanginess of the apple sauce
and the juice from the lamb goes down my throat, I feel happiness!
To think a flavor like this existed in this world!
Do not eat that meat, Okuyasu!
It is like happiness over and over!
Wash your hands with soap right now!
Entering the kitchen without permission is unforgivable!
Are you telling me to wash my hands?
My guts suddenly feel way better!
Nothing brings me more joy and happiness than a customer who
enjoys my cooking and becomes healthy.
This dish was a little iffy, so I was having him taste it first.
His tummy was a little upset, too.
Y-You... seriously only wanted to feed Okuyasu good food?
What else could a chef ask for?
That is what I live for.
That is all I hope for.
You are a Stand user, are not you?
When I went around the world
looking for what my ideal cooking would be, that is when I realized my powers.
This is the first time I have met anyone else with similar powers.
You touched things without washing your hands, did not you?!
The number one enemy in a kitchen is germs!
That is why I got angry!
Now, let us continue with the cooking.
But I am a street punk!
I am so proud to live in Morioh, where a chef like you lives!
It appears that he is pleased.
Hey, my athlete's foot is all better!
I am with the Speedwagon Foundation.
Apparently, anywhere near electrical wires is dangerous,
including phone lines and power lines,
so I came to deliver this message myself.
I should be arriving at Morioh's port tomorrow at noon.
